summary: Retextured mage robes for your female characters.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][color=#6fa8dc][size=6][b]Mage Robes[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=4]New mage robes for your female characters
Mage Associate[font=Tahoma][b], [/b][/font]Master & Grandmaster Robes[/size][/color]

[i]- The robes, hoods and boots are craftable at tanning rack.
- 10 sets of unenchanted and enchanted clothes, robes, boots and hoods - colors to match each others.
- Enchanted versions are unlocked as you get magic skills.
[i]- You can choose any color you like and get full bonuses from enchants, all magic school variants covered.[/i]
- Enchanted Master and Grandmaster Robes and can be crafted when you have mastered a magic school.
[/i]
[color=#93c47d]-- [font=Comic Sans MS]No overpowered enchants[/font] --
[/color]-- [font=Comic Sans MS][color=#93c47d]Robes are 4k, hoods & boots 2k quality[/color][/font] --
-- [font=Comic Sans MS][color=#93c47d]Uses UNP Body[/color][/font] --


Without these mods this mod wouldn't exist, so check them out too:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35002/?tab=3&selected_game=110&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D35002%26user%3D1%26gid%3D110&pUp=1]Opulent Outfits
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22732/?]UNP Boots 02[/url]
[u][size=4]
[/size][/u][font=Comic Sans MS]Thanks to all who made my game much better, in this case mainly: babooncru, Mebantiza, TIWA44, Zonzai, Petrovich[/font]
author: DenassaG
